@graph.name: Vegan Gingerbread Banana Bread Recipe - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: This Vegan Gingerbread Banana Bread recipe combines soft and moist Banana bread with Spiced gingerbread for the ultimate holiday treat.

@graph.name: Gingerbread Banana Bread
@graph.description: This Vegan Gingerbread Banana Bread recipe combines soft and moist gingerbread with spiced banana bread for the ultimate holiday treat.
recipeIngredient: 1/3 cup sugar (such as coconut sugar, light brown sugar (1/4 cup for less sweet or if the bananas are very ripe ))
2 tbsp oil (omit to make oil free)
1 3/4 cup flour ((I use 1 1/4 all purpose, and 1/2 cup of whole wheat or spelt))
1-1.5 tsp gingerbread spice (or a mix of 1 tsp cinnamon,1/4 tsp ginger , 1/8 tsp cloves, nutmeg, allspice )

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 365 degrees F (185 C), and line a 9x5 or 8.5x4.5 inch loaf pan with parchment.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 365 degrees F (185 C), and line a 9x5 or 8.5x4.5 inch loaf pan with parchment.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl mix all the wet ingredients till well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl mix all the wet ingredients till well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, mix the flours ,the baking powder, baking soda, salt, and spices until well combined, then mix in the candied ginger.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, mix the flours ,the baking powder, baking soda, salt, and spices until well combined, then mix in the candied ginger.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1 3/4 cup of the dried mixture to the wet mixture, and mix in. Add the rest of the dry flour mix 1 tbsp at a time until it is a stiff muffin batter. If it is not stiff enough, add another 1 or two tbsp of flour
recipeInstructions.name: Add 1 3/4 cup of the dried mixture to the wet mixture, and mix in. Add the rest of the dry flour mix 1 tbsp at a time until it is a stiff muffin batter. If it is not stiff enough, add another 1 or two tbsp of flour

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the batter to the lined loaf pan, and even it out with a spatula. Sprinkle the top with 1 tbsp of brown sugar, and 1/2 tsp of cinnamon. This is optional, but I like the crust it gives the banana bread. You can also add some candied ginger on top, or some pecans tossed in maple syrup for a candied pecan top
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer the batter to the lined loaf pan, and even it out with a spatula. Sprinkle the top with 1 tbsp of brown sugar, and 1/2 tsp of cinnamon. This is optional, but I like the crust it gives the banana bread. You can also add some candied ginger on top, or some pecans tossed in maple syrup for a candied pecan top

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 55 minutes. Check with a toothpick from the center of the loaf, if it comes out clean, then remove from the oven else bake for another 5-10. cool the loaf for 10 minutes before taking out of the pan. Then cool completely before slicing.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 55 minutes. Check with a toothpick from the center of the loaf, if it comes out clean, then remove from the oven else bake for another 5-10. cool the loaf for 10 minutes before taking out of the pan. Then cool completely before slicing.

@graph.keywords: vegan banana bread, vegan gingerbread loaf
